data.description: RARE 3 BEDROOM + LOFT, 2 BATH TOWNHOME IN CHAMPAGNE IN WILLOWRIDGE*TILE ENTRY*LAMINATE WOOD FLOORS IN LIVING ROOM AND KITCHEN*CENTRAL AIR*BRAND NEW INTERIOR PAINT*BRAND NEW CARPET*NEW WINDOWS ON FIRST FLOOR* NICE KITCHEN INCLUDES REFRIGERATOR, DISHWASHER AND STAINLESS STEEL STOVE/RANGE/OVEN AND MICROWAVE*NEW SLIDING GLASS DOOR TO PATIO*LARGE LOFT*LARGE MASTER INCLUDES WALK IN CLOSET AND PRIVATE DECK*HOME ALSO HAS A 40 GALLON HOT WATER HEATER AND 6 PANEL DOORS*
